thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Kingsun Science & Technology sees FY 2017 net profit to down 18 pct to up 8 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Kingsun Science & Technology sees FY 2017 net profit to down 18 pct to up 8 pct

organizations.name: shenzhen kingsun science & technology co ltd

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Shenzhen Kingsun Science & Technology Co Ltd
* Says it sees FY 2017 net profit to decrease by 18 percent to increase by 8 percent, or to be 15.1 million yuan to 19.9 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 18.4 million yuan
* Comments that increased main business income and decreased costs as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/9RTfRZ
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
